newsitem.title: USA: Anixter International Inc Q1 net rises.
newsitem.headline: Anixter International Inc Q1 net rises.

text.p: (All data above millions except per share numbers)

NOTE: Q1 1997 includes nonrecurring, pre-tax gain of $2.1 million related to the Antec Corp/TSX Corp merger. Anixter said it holds a 19 percent interest in the merged companies and has ceased recording equity earnings.
